nml_option.name: config_AM_highFrequencyOutput_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member highFrequencyOutput is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_highFrequencyOutput_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_highFrequencyOutput_stream_name
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the highFrequencyOutput analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_highFrequencyOutput_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_highFrequencyOutput_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: highFrequencyOutputAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the highFrequencyOutput analysis member.

var.name: kineticEnergyAt100m
var.description: kinetic energy at a depth of approximately 100 m

var.name: relativeVorticityAt100m
var.description: relative vorticity at cell centers at a depth of approximately 100 m
